item.title: We are aware of the power outage in the northeastern part of
item.description: We are aware of the power outage in the northeastern part of the county effecting approximately 1000 customers. Crews are in the area and the projected restoration time is 0830. Please use caution in the area as crews are working along roadways. Also be patient as they restore service.

item.title: AT&T maybe experiencing a network service outage impacting t
item.description: AT&T maybe experiencing a network service outage impacting the ability to deliver AT&T 911 calls in area. We have made several test calls without issue, but want to make callers aware of the possibility of issues with placing emergency calls. AT&T has confirmed that their teams are working to isolate and resolve the issue. The cause of the outage has not yet been determined. If you have AT&T be aware of the potential issues placing emergency calls. If you experience any issues while dialing 9-1-1, please attempt to call again or use an alternative method to reach emergency services, such as a landline or text to 911. You may contact the Morgan County 911 Center by calling 304-258-9911. Other carriers and land line callers are not affected. This problem is reported only by AT&T .
